DocLocalization.Name: Définition de section d'un profil en C

DocAttribute.Name: Depth
DocAttribute.Documentation: Profile depth, see illustration above (= h).

DocAttribute.Name: Width
DocAttribute.Documentation: Profile width, see illustration above (= b).

DocAttribute.Name: WallThickness
DocAttribute.Documentation: Constant wall thickness of profile (= ts).

DocAttribute.Name: Girth
DocAttribute.Documentation: Lengths of girth, see illustration above (= c).

DocAttribute.Name: InternalFilletRadius
DocAttribute.Documentation: Internal fillet radius according the above illustration (= r1).

DocWhereRule.Name: ValidGirth
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The girth shall be smaller than half of the depth.

DocWhereRule.Name: ValidInternalFilletRadius
DocWhereRule.Documentation: If the value for InternalFilletRadius is given, it shall be small enough to fit into the inner space.
DocWhereRule.Expression: NOT(EXISTS(InternalFilletRadius)) OR ((InternalFilletRadius <= Width/2. - WallThickness) AND (InternalFilletRadius <= Depth/2. - WallThickness))

DocWhereRule.Name: ValidWallThickness
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The WallThickness shall be smaller than half of the Width and half of the Depth.
